channel.title: Homes on Anqi (Angie) Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Anqi (Angie) Liu

item.description: I am an Assistant Professor in the CS department at the Whiting School of Engineering of the Johns Hopkins University. I am also affiliated with the Johns Hopkins Mathematical Institute for Data Science (MINDS) and the Johns Hopkins Institute for Assured Autonomy (IAA). I collaborate extensitively with the Center for Language and Speech Processing (CLSP) and the Laboratory for Computational Sensing and Robotics (LCSR). My research interest lies in machine learning for trustworthy AI.
